title: Subjectivity as Relation

dialogue.speaker: The Architect
dialogue.text: But here's where it gets juicy: subjectivity isn't inside your head. It's a relation.
dialogue.tone: building excitement for a key insight
dialogue.context: The AI introduces a fundamental reframing of where subjectivity exists

scene_context: The Architect prepares to reveal a crucial insight - that subjectivity isn't contained within individuals but exists in the relationships between consciousness and world.
philosophical_theme: Relational nature of consciousness, subjectivity as emergent from interaction
visual_elements: Subjectivity shown not as contained within a head but as lines of connection between entities
